dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, B! AHAHAHA! You actually believe that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, B! A H A H A H A! You actually believe that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Believe what, A? The absolute, uh, trainwreck that's unfolding right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Believe what, A? The absolute, uh, trainwreck that's unfolding right now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That China isn't meddling in our elections! Pence said it, like, straight up! They want Trump gone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That China isn't meddling in our elections! Pence said it, like, straight up! They want Trump gone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vice President Mike Pence launched a cannonball across the bow of Chinas ship of state last week. He said the country was meddling in the midterm elections. They want President Trump gone in an impeachment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Scoffs. Pence said a lot of things. It’s just, uh, an excuse to unleash those new sanctions, isn’t it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Scoffs. Pence said a lot of things. It's just, uh, an excuse to unleash those new sanctions, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If China was meddling, it sets the table for Washington to sanction them under two new executive orders signed by Trump and the August 2017 Countering Americas Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Excuse? We have leaked documents! They're funneling money to specific candidates! And Pompeo was, like, practically tearing his hair out after his meeting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Excuse? We have leaked documents! They're funneling money to specific candidates! And Pompeo was, like, practically tearing his hair out after his meeting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention leaked documents or funneling money. It does mention Pompeo's meeting: 'Top diplomats on both sides said Secretary of State Mike Pompeo was getting nowhere with this Chinese counterparts. He said they were fundamental disagreements over a range of issues...'

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pompeo’s "frustration" is just his inability to, uh, actually negotiate anything. China sees this as economic warfare, and I can kinda see why.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pompeo's frustration is just his inability to, uh, actually negotiate anything. China sees this as economic warfare, and I can kinda see why.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has finally come to pass that China views Trumps policies against it as economic warfare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Economic warfare? They're the ones distorting the global economy with those state-owned enterprises! Even the B20 called them out!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Economic warfare? They're the ones distorting the global economy with those state-owned enterprises! Even the B20 called them out!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Business 20, an international business advisory group affiliated with the Group of 20, blasted Beijing over the role of state-owned enterprises in the world economy. ... Business 20 issued a note last week calling for an end to state-related competitive distortions...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And China, of course, rejects that! They view our policies as a planned attack against them. Honestly, can you blame them, A?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And China, of course, rejects that! They view our policies as a planned attack against them. Honestly, can you blame them, A?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the wording met with strong objections from the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, a semigovernmental trade advocacy group. They insisted that the B20 proposal should not be submitted to G20 leaders at the Argentina meetup in November.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Blame them? They're the reason the markets are, like, tanking! Shanghai plummeted, what, six percent after Pompeo left?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Blame them? They're the reason the markets are, like, tanking! Shanghai plummeted, what, six percent after Pompeo left?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following a weeklong holiday in China, mainland equities fell by as much as 4.7% in some Shanghai stock indexes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's the market reacting to your side's constant, uh, escalation! The tariffs, the accusations, it's just relentless!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the market reacting to your side's constant, uh, escalation! The tariffs, the accusations, it's just relentless!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so it's our fault they're accusing us of putting spy chips in Apple products? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so it's our fault they're accusing us of putting spy chips in Apple products? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi accused Washington of... leveling false accusations against China regarding election interference and inserting chips in Apple products in order to spy on U.S. companies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And you're accusing them of election interference with zero, uh, public evidence! It's not a one-way street, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you're accusing them of election interference with zero, uh, public evidence! It's not a one-way street, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vice President Mike Pence launched a cannonball across the bow of Chinas ship of state last week. He said the country was meddling in the midterm elections.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's not "both ways"! It's China being, like, a closed, Communist economy, trying to dictate terms!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not both ways! It's China being, like, a closed, Communist economy, trying to dictate terms!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Investors and academics have argued for years that China distorts the global economy because on one side you have free market capitalism as the No. 1 economy and on the other, you have a largely closed market Communist economy as the worlds No. 2.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's two superpowers, uh, completely misreading each other, and one side, frankly, is being way too aggressive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's two superpowers, uh, completely misreading each other, and one side, frankly, is being way too aggressive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Aggressive? We're defending ourselves from, um, their constant economic bullying!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Aggressive? We're defending ourselves from, um, their constant economic bullying!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, you're, uh, just pushing them into Russia's arms, that's what you're doing. A Trump-Putin joint approach? Come on!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, you're, uh, just pushing them into Russia's arms, that's what you're doing. A Trump-Putin joint approach? Come on!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For now, China's most outspoken ally is Russia, a country weakened by U.S. and European sanctions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, someone has to deal with China's, like, constant, um, undermining!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, someone has to deal with China's, like, constant, um, undermining!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And you think this aggressive, confrontational stance is the way? I just, I don't see it ending well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you think this aggressive, confrontational stance is the way? I just, I don't see it ending well.
